comments:
It seems SystemKillProcessAction tries to get the system message when a user tries to kill a process in RSE view and the ProcessesPlugin.getPluginMessage function returns null which results NullPointerException.

*** Bug 153276 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***

Setting P2 since 2 people reported this individually.
Without being able to kill processes, the processes subsystem is not very useful.
The message file name was changed to a more appropriate name and this fixes the problem.
verified that it is fixed in 1.0RC3. no longer getting the NullPointerException when trying to kill a process.
